main event: On the afternoon of 23 October 1954, a military observer reported seeing a round, white object at the Merced Country Club which traveled in a north to south direction for approximately 25 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as having a diameter of about 40 feet and a metallic appearance., The observer reported a loud jet sound comparable to air escaping under high pressure., The observation lasted for about 25 seconds before the object disappeared into clouds., Similar sightings in the Merced area had been reported for the past 6 months., The sighting was made while the observer was on the golf course and did not include any other reported witnesses.
witness description: military personnel observed the object during a golf game
